General.Name: Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport Company Limited engages in the operation of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport in China. It offers aircraft take-off and landing, passenger transit, security inspection, emergency rescue, and aviation ground services; and passenger and cargo sales agency, and aviation insurance sales agency services. The company also provides parking lot, warehousing, logistics and distribution, cargo and mail handling, passenger and cargo ground transportation, etc.; and landscaping, cleaning, air transport technical cooperation intermediary, aviation information consulting, and other related services. In addition, it engages in the real estate development, land, property, equipment and facility leasing, property management, and engineering design and construction activities. Further, the company offers internet information, decoration, hotel management, and bar services, as well as automobile transportation, tourism, catering, advertising, automobile maintenance, mechanical and electrical equipment maintenance, and house and line pipeline maintenance services. Additionally, it engages in the leisure fitness and entertainment activities, including swimming pool, fitness room, table tennis room, billiard room, and chess and card room; wholesale and retail of commodities, such as food, tobacco, and alcohol; and development and sale of software. The company provides sauna, beauty, hairdressing, laundry, photos and washing, and accepting theatrical performances services, as well as duty-free shops. Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
